site.title: Charushree — Product Lead & AI Engineer
site.description: Product-led builder blending AI systems, user insight, and business value.

hero.name: Charushree
hero.headline: I build AI-native products that ship value.
hero.subheadline: From 0→1 experiments to scale, I blend product sense, ML systems, and GTM to ship outcomes.

about.title: About
about.content: Product leader with hands-on AI engineering depth. I’ve led cross-functional teams to build recommendation systems, copilots, and automation features that moved retention and revenue. I care about swift iteration, clear metrics, and delightful UX.

highlights: Shipped an LLM-powered support copilot reducing average handle time by 28%.
Launched cold-start recommendations; 12% lift in day-7 retention.
Led a squad of 8 (PMs, DS, Eng, Design) with weekly experiment cadence.
Built real-time ranking with feature store + online learning pipeline.
Partnered with Design to add human-in-the-loop feedback loops.

items.name: InsightCopilot
items.description: Task-aware assistant that drafts insights from analytics logs using retrieval-augmented generation.

items.name: Realtime Ranker
items.description: A streaming ranking service with bandits for exploration.
